name: CMake in Codespaces
updateContentCommand: curl https://apt.kitware.com/kitware-archive.sh | sudo sh && sudo apt-get install -y cmake && pipx install conan && wget https://github.com/ninja-build/ninja/releases/download/v1.12.1/ninja-linux.zip && sudo unzip -o ninja-linux.zip -d /usr/bin && rm ninja-linux.zip && sudo apt-get install -y lsb-release wget software-properties-common gnupg && sudo bash -c "$(wget -O - https://apt.llvm.org/llvm.sh)" bash 18 all
